Chapter Previous Next

class gstSpatialPartition : public gstSpatialObject

Class to act as a base class for all types of spatial partitions which will get imposed on GHOST objects.

From header file: gstSpatialPartition.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstSpatialPartition
~gstSpatialPartition
Virtual Functions
beginModifyNotification method indicating that a particular gstSpatialObject inside of the partition is going to be modified/moved.
endModifyNotification method indicating that a particular gstSpatialObject inside of the partition is finished being modified/moved.
initTriggers the building of the partition.
